author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:
The definition of TProfile of # of hits, layers, chi2 vs eta, phi is incorrect. See example [plot](https://cmsweb.cern.ch/dqm/online-test/start?runnr=352572;dataset=/Global/Online/ALL;sampletype=online_data;filter=all;referencepos=overlay;referenceshow=customise;referencenorm=True;referenceobj1=refobj;referenceobj2=none;referenceobj3=none;referenceobj4=none;search=;striptype=object;stripruns=;stripaxis=run;stripomit=none;workspace=Everything;size=M;root=SiPixelHeterogeneous/PixelTracksCPU;focus=SiPixelHeterogeneous/PixelTracksCPU/nLayersPerTrackVsEta;zoom=yes;) This PR fixes it. 
#### PR validation:
Pixel only GPU wf runs. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backport to 12.4 and 12.3 is needed.
title: Pixel Heterogenous DQM: fix bug in TProfile definitions
